description: Capture your opportunity for first time home buyer or an investment property. This 3 bedroom/1.5 bath has room for everyone. Well laid out with a breakfast bar to start your day. Kitchen is spacious with stainless steel appliances. Car port with cabinets to store your stuff. Great location close to transit, schools, Golden Ears bridge, shopping, nature. Family friendly complex in a quiet cul-de-sac. Come see for yourself.
